text: ai jinnon aur manushyon ke giroh! kya tumhaare paas tumheen mein se rasool nahin aae the, jo tumhen meree aayaten sunaate aur is din ke pesh aane se tumhen daraate the?" ve kahenge, "kyon nahin! (rasool to aae the) ham svayan apane viruddh gavaah hai." unhen to saansaarik jeevan ne dhokhe mein rakha. magar ab ve svayan apane viruddh gavaahee dene lage ki ve inakaar karanevaale the
